title: Capsule vs. Bean Cost Comparison
description: Discover how much you could save by switching from capsules to fresh beans with an Arco machine. Enter your daily consumption and see the real numbers — monthly costs, break-even timeline, and five-year savings.

inputs.label: Price Per Kg of Whole Beans (your currency)

formula: capsule_monthly = cups_per_day × 30.4 × capsule_cost. bean_grams_per_cup ≈ 16g (double shot average). bean_monthly = cups_per_day × 30.4 × 0.016 × coffee_budget_per_kg. monthly_savings = capsule_monthly − bean_monthly. break_even = machine_price / monthly_savings. five_year_savings = monthly_savings × 60 − machine_price. Also calculates cost_per_cup for beans.
output_format: Monthly capsule cost, monthly bean cost, monthly savings, bean cost per cup, break-even months, five-year net savings, and a summary statement.

cta.label: Find the Right Machine for Your Budget
